.pull-left[
### Access
Right radial artery, 6F sheath  
5F JR-4 and JL-3.5 diagnostic  
RCA guide with 6F AL-0.75  
LCA guide with 6F EBU-3.5  

### Interventions
RCA wired with Sion Blue  
Predilation and IVUS of RCA  
DES to RCA  
LM wired with Sion Blue  
Re-dilation and IVUS of LAD  
DES to mLAD and pLAD  
Post-IVUS run  
]

.pull-right[
### Outcomes
- 3.0 x 38 mm DES to pRCA
- 3.5 x 38 mm DES to mLAD
- 3.0 x 12 mm DES to mLAD (overlap)
- Successful TIMI 3 flow in RCA/LCA
]

### Access
Left radial 6F sheath (right too small caliber)  
5F JR-4 and JL-3.5 diagnostic  
LCA with XB-3.5 guide  

### Interventions
BMW into diagonal  
Pilot 50 into dLAD  
IVUS of lesion with 360Ëš calcium  
IVL  
DES to pLAD  
]

.pull-right[
### Outcomes
- Successful TIMI-3 flow
- Shockwave 4.0 x 12 mm x 5 cycles
- 4.0 x 18 mm DES to pLAD
]
